Spyrovic you wanted this
title: The Evidence that was used against me

replies.body:
Clip 1: lol people trying to detect smooth aimbot on a youtube video smh
Not cheating.

Clip 2: You had a lag spike for like half a second on the recording. You can tell because Raging freezes for a tiny period while your crosshair also freezes. 
Not cheating.

Clip 3: Your aim legit sucks in this clip. You get a lucky hit and then a flick onto him in your turn and then you miss him.
Not cheating.

Clip 4: Obviously it's a weird flick but it's nothing wow
Fishy

Clip 5: Apparently people aren't allowed to aim/ pre aim now? Most dumbest clip ever lol. Not even a fucking lock, go to 0.25, slow movement.
Not cheating.

Clip 6: Ok this looks kinda sketchy. 1 hit in the middle where you look like you're not in the hitbox of Maraka, but idk your ping. Then you go over the dead body a bit, a bit like how a trigger bot would glitch. but it's minute and nothing major.
Fishy

Clip 7: Am I being told you're being partially banned for you aiming in a different way to how you normally do? This is legit the complete opposite of what an aimbot would do, aka robotically move lol.
Not cheating.

Clip 8: Don't see what's wrong with this clip? Like, I don't see what they're trying to point at? Is it how your crosshair goes on to the guy falling out of the world as you've gotten knockbacked and your crosshair stays still? What kind of 'lock is this'
Not cheating.

Clip 9: Looks a bit like a lock, but there's nothing to lock on to,you are already on the body when the lock happens. Looks a bit like a tiny lag spike. That's not what an aimbot would do. Looks a bit weird though.
Weird, but not cheating.

Overall, there's a few weird/ fishy clips, but nothing that outright says 'omg ban you're cheating. There's like 3/9 clips that look somewhat fishy. lol.

replies.body: Well, honestly I watched every single video but I couldn't see anything sketchy. Maybe that's because I'm noob at this job. But what I can't understand is why seniors are using a stratus montage as an evidence? I don't think he is hacking but even if he hacks it's not avicus, seniors should not be using that as an evidence. Most people here are banned on some servers. Does it mean we all hack here on avicus? I hope you get unbanned soon {tag=50a34639abb34cf1b182204756c49f49}
